originalText.text: I really recommend this place she was able to fix my phone when other places couldn't.. she was honest and did a awesome job.. definitely would come back here if needed. Excellent customer service and fair pricing.üëèüôå

originalText.text: This place is amazing!!! After dropping my Samsung S20 the screen finally cracked and went completely blank. I reached out for help to get the data off my S20 transferred to my new phone. Cell Phone Repair handled the job with no problem. They were able to transfer all of my contacts, messages, apps, and pictures to my new phone. I will definitely use them for any cell phone repairs. Thanks isabell

text.text: This place is amazing!!! After dropping my Samsung S20 the screen finally cracked and went completely blank. I reached out for help to get the data off my S20 transferred to my new phone. Cell Phone Repair handled the job with no problem. They were able to transfer all of my contacts, messages, apps, and pictures to my new phone. I will definitely use them for any cell phone repairs. Thanks isabell

originalText.text:
Ha, I live in the Washington Heiights neighborhood and my husband and our grand and great grand children all have devices. After checking around for quality services for phone and Ipad we gave this company a try.
We love the prices and the immediate repair for our items.
Yesterday, 7/29/2023 I took my damaged iPad to them around 2:30pm with the broken screen and by 5pm I was told the job was done. I went and picked up my iPad. I am very happy with their services.
In the past we had another iPad and phone repaired and the service was excellent.
We would recommend this fix-it shop to our family members and friends.
Thank you guys for your commendable service.
Evangeline James and family

originalText.text:
I came to this place because of the many amazing reviews. Unfortunately, I am wondering how this has any positive reviews considering the saga I‚Äôve gone through with them. I came to get a screen replacement for an iPhone SE 2022 model. The gentleman said he‚Äôd take care of it and would call me the next day. Before I even got back home, he called me (about 10-15 minutes before the store closed) to tell me he had fixed it already and I could come get it. I live nearby so, I made my way back to pick it up. Clearly, the job was rushed because my phone was now overheating- an issue I had not had before as this phone was less than a year old. I called and brought it in again to be looked at the next day, the store replaced the phone for me and kept my original phone. However, when I got home and went through the process of connecting it to my mobile service, I realized the phone was an older model with less battery life, outdated processor and no 5G capability- a phone worth half the one I came in with originally. I called the store again asking for the same model phone as the one that they damaged, I was told to give them a few days. After several calls and lots of back and forth with no one taking responsibility, I asked for my old phone to be returned instead of getting a refund. I‚Äôd rather take it elsewhere to get it properly fixed than deal with a business consistently trying to bury their very clear mistake.

The worst part of the experience is feeling like I was strung along because I did not speak Spanish. I only got results when my Spanish speaking partner called to see what the issue was even though he did speak some English. He may have also assumed I had no basic knowledge of electronics and seemed surprised that I knew I was given an older model phone.

Be wary, all the 5 star reviews don‚Äôt speak to how this business is run. I found it very unprofessional and suspicious.

originalText.text: Great repair experience. Came in with a cracked screen and broken cameras. The customer service was excellent and I received a discount for the service! Phone is good as new!

text.text: Great repair experience. Came in with a cracked screen and broken cameras. The customer service was excellent and I received a discount for the service! Phone is good as new!
